Description: A unique identifier for the post
The date when the post was created or updated
The year in which the property was built
The name of the neighborhood where the property is located
The name of the city where the property is located
The name of the county where the property is located
The number of bedrooms in the property
The number of bathrooms on the property
The total area of the property in square feet
A Boolean variable indicating whether the property is a single room in an apartment
The street address of the property
The latitude coordinate of the property's location
The longitude coordinate of the property's location
The title or headline of the post
A brief description of the property and its features
Additional details about the property, such as amenities, utilities, or nearby attractions
Example Data: Gym, rooftop terrace, laundry room, Cats

Description: Count of description for apartment details
